My Application Welcome to your Carbon Footprint Calculator! SIGN UP Not signed up? LOGIN CONFIRM PASSWORD PASSWORD USERNAME LOGIN CONTINUE My Profile TAKE AUDIT VIEW SCORE TIPS & LEGISLATION LOG OUT ProfilePicture EMAIL SIGNUP REGISTER BACK AUDIT QUESTIONS NEXT
//questions//
YES NO N/A
Does your company provide low emission vehicles ? Employees drive more than 300 miles a day Do employees travel with empty roofracks on their vehicles Does your office have an ecoteam/sustainability team ? Does your office have green goals to be more eco-friendly ? Does your office have initiatives to ensure electronics are turned off ? Does your office use renewable energy ? Are there desk plants and indoor plants in your office ? Does your company have aeroated taps installed ? Does your company have dual flush toilets ? Does your company have motion sensored lights installed ?# Does your office use LED bulbs ? Or any other energy efficient alternative ? Does your office use programmable thermostats ? Are there draught exclusers installed in your offices ? Do your offices have double glazing ? How often do employees check their tire pressure? MONTHLY BI-MONTHLY EVERY 6 MONTHS ANNUALLY How often do you change your fuel filter? EVERY 30,000mi EVERY 50,000mi EVERY 80,000mi NEVER How often do you flush your fuel injectors ? Are company vehicles self-washed or washed at a carwash ? SELF-WASHED CARWASH How much paper do office workers use per month per person ? 10,000 sheets 20,000 sheets 50,000 sheets MUST BE LONGER THAN 6 CHARACTERS Authenication Failed !
